item_lost_earring.name: Lost Earring
item_lost_earring.description: A small silver earring, likely forgotten by a previous guest.

item_old_coin.name: Ancient Coin
item_old_coin.description: A tarnished silver coin bearing unfamiliar markings. It appears to be very old and might be valuable to a collector.

item_glowing_crystal.name: Glowing Crystal
item_glowing_crystal.description: A fist-sized crystal that emits a faint blue glow. It feels warm to the touch and seems to pulse with an inner light.

item_crystal_shard.name: Crystal Shard
item_crystal_shard.description: A sharp shard broken off from a larger crystal formation.

item_obsidian_chunk.name: Obsidian Chunk
item_obsidian_chunk.description: A piece of sharp, black volcanic glass.

item_gold_nugget.name: Gold Nugget
item_gold_nugget.description: A small, rough nugget of pure gold, likely missed by the original miners.

item_ancient_amulet.name: Ancient Amulet
item_ancient_amulet.description: A heavy amulet made of an unknown black metal, set with a dull, unblinking gem.

item_muddy_brooch.name: Mud-Covered Brooch
item_muddy_brooch.description: A fancy brooch, caked in thick mud. If cleaned, it might be quite valuable.

item_dubious_cargo.name: Dubious Cargo
item_dubious_cargo.description: A small, locked chest containing unknown contents. It looks valuable but likely stolen.
